name: Kitten Madness
description: Kitten Madness is an open world fast pace game where you race a kitten through various levels and game types. Kitten Madness starts out as a single player game where you control a cute kitten performing the playful actions of a kitten.
minimum_requirements: OS: Window vISTA Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 9 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8 64-bit Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 9 GB available space
